description: The CVG_REL_OF_INFO table contains a list of release of information data that has been received for members on a coverage.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the coverage record. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reportingï¿½s encryption utility.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of release of information on the coverage.

columns.name: ROI_PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique patient ID associated with the release of information.

columns.name: ROI_CONSENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the member's release of information.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ROI_EFF_DATE
columns.description: The effective date of the release of information for a member on the coverage.

columns.name: ROI_TERM_DATE
columns.description: The termination date of the release of information for a member on the coverage.

columns.name: ROI_SOURCE_DOC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source document associated with the release of information for a member on the coverage.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ROI_DOC_DATE
columns.description: The date of the source document associated with the release of information for a member on the coverage.

columns.name: ROI_COMMENT
columns.description: The free text comment associated with the release of information for a member on the coverage.
